mapper.sql: id, user_id, username, password, phone, icon, email, nick_name, note, create_time, login_time, status, type
mapper.select:
select
from user
and phone = #{phone}
and status = 1
order by create_time desc
mapper.insert: insert into user (id, user_id, username, password, phone, icon, email, nick_name, note, create_time, login_time, status, type) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{icon,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{nickName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{note,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{loginTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{type,jdbcType=INTEGER})

id,
user_id,

password,

mapper.update:
update user
user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
username = #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
password = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
phone = #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
icon = #{icon,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
email = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
nick_name = #{nickName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
note = #{note,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
login_time = #{loginTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER},
type = #{type,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update user set user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, username = #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, password = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, phone = #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, icon = #{icon,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, email = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, nick_name = #{nickName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, note = #{note,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, login_time = #{loginTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, type = #{type,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
